original: @192b # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @192b # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: shr'i badzra yo gi n'i mantra tatt'a //
analyzed: shr'i badzra yo gi n'i mantra tatt'a //
translated: Śrīvajrayoginīmantra-tattva

original: artha nir de sha sla aa dhi shath'a na n'a ma //
analyzed: artha nir de sha sla aa dhi shath'a na n'a ma //
translated: Arthaniḥśeṣasādhana-ādhiṣṭhāna-nāma

original: bong skad du /
analyzed: bong skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: dpal rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i sngags kyi de kho na nyid kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i rim pa zhes bya ba //
analyzed: dpal rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i sngags kyi de kho na nyid kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i rim pa zhes bya ba //
translated: The glorious Vajrayoginī’s Mantra Tattva Adhiṣṭhāna Sādhana

original: dpal rdo rje rnal 'byor ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: dpal rdo rje rnal 'byor ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the glorious Vajrayoginī.

original: sngags gzugs rgyal ba'i dbang phyug ma //
analyzed: sngags gzugs rgyal ba'i dbang phyug ma //
translated: The mantra form of the queen of the victors,

original: shin du 'jigs shing mchog ster byed //
analyzed: shin du 'jigs shing mchog ster byed //
translated: Extremely terrifying, bestowing the supreme,

original: thig le phra mor nyer gnas pa //
analyzed: thig le phra mor nyer gnas pa //
translated: Abiding in the subtle bindu,

original: phyag 'tshal rdo rje phag mo dpal //
analyzed: phyag 'tshal rdo rje phag mo dpal //
translated: Homage to the glorious Vajravārāhī.

original: yi ge re'i de kho na nyid //
analyzed: yi ge re'i de kho na nyid //
translated: The reality of each syllable,

original: 'phral du yang dag yid ches byed //
analyzed: 'phral du yang dag yid ches byed //
translated: Should be fully trusted right now.

original: bgegs rnams thams cad rlag par byed //
analyzed: bgegs rnams thams cad rlag par byed //
translated: It destroys all obstacles,

original: gsang sngags don ni bshad bar bya //
analyzed: gsang sngags don ni bshad bar bya //
translated: The meaning of the mantra will be explained.

original: bu yi yi ge'i mdun du blta //
analyzed: bu yi yi ge'i mdun du blta //
translated: Look in front of the son's syllable,

original: phyag 'tshal yi ge rab gsal ba //
analyzed: phyag 'tshal yi ge rab gsal ba //
translated: Homage to the clearly manifest syllable,

original: chos kyis lam de bshad par bya //
analyzed: chos kyis lam de bshad par bya //
translated: The path of Dharma will be explained.

original: rba rlabs med cing dri ma med //
analyzed: rba rlabs med cing dri ma med //
translated: Without waves, without stains,

original: nyi ma lta bu'i rnam pa can //
analyzed: nyi ma lta bu'i rnam pa can //
translated: The form of the sun.

original: chos kun rab tu mi gnas pa //
analyzed: chos kun rab tu mi gnas pa //
translated: All phenomena are completely non-abiding,

original: dngos dang dngos med rnam par spangs //
analyzed: dngos dang dngos med rnam par spangs //
translated: Abandoned as both entities and non-entities.

original: blo dang ldan pas rtag tu bsgom //
analyzed: blo dang ldan pas rtag tu bsgom //
translated: The wise always meditate on that.

original: chos kyi sku ni thob 'gyur ba //🔽blo ldan skye ba 'di yis ni //
analyzed: chos kyi sku ni thob 'gyur ba // blo ldan skye ba 'di yis ni //
translated: The dharmakāya is attained.🔽The wise attain the sambhogakāya

original: de la goms pa tsam gyis ni //
analyzed: de la goms pa tsam gyis ni //
translated: By merely becoming familiar with that in this life.

original: 'phral du yang dag yid ches 'gyur //
analyzed: 'phral du yang dag yid ches 'gyur //
translated: Immediately, one becomes completely confident.

original: rig byed dang po g-yon du bsam //
analyzed: rig byed dang po g-yon du bsam //
translated: The first knowledge is imagined to be on the left.

original: longs sku spyod lam legs pa yin //
analyzed: longs sku spyod lam legs pa yin //
translated: The sambhogakāya is the excellent conduct.

original: rten cing 'brel 'byung ye shes te //
analyzed: rten cing 'brel 'byung ye shes te //
translated: The dependent origination is pristine consciousness.

original: shin tu legs pa'i 'od gsal ba //
analyzed: shin tu legs pa'i 'od gsal ba //
translated: It is the excellent clear light.

original: 'di ni zung 'jug shes bya ste //
analyzed: 'di ni zung 'jug shes bya ste //
translated: This is to be known as union.

original: ji ltar brag ca 'dra ba yis //
analyzed: ji ltar brag ca 'dra ba yis //
translated: Just like an echo,

original: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku thob 'gyur //🔽rang rig bde ba'i mchog gyur ba //
analyzed: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku thob 'gyur // rang rig bde ba'i mchog gyur ba //
translated: The sambhogakāya is attained.🔽The supreme bliss of reflexive awareness

original: g-yas pa ye shes rgya mtsho ste //
analyzed: g-yas pa ye shes rgya mtsho ste //
translated: Is the ocean of pristine consciousness on the right.

original: sprul ba'i lam ni dri ma med //
analyzed: sprul ba'i lam ni dri ma med //
translated: The path of emanation is stainless.

original: sgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin gyis //
analyzed: sgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin gyis //
translated: Through the samādhi of the illusion-like

original: chu zla 'dra bar bsam par bya //
analyzed: chu zla 'dra bar bsam par bya //
translated: One should imagine the moon in the water.

original: sbrul ba'i sku ni yang dag thob //
analyzed: sbrul ba'i sku ni yang dag thob //
translated: The nirmāṇakāya is truly attained.

original: me long gzugs brnyan 'dra ba bzhin //
analyzed: me long gzugs brnyan 'dra ba bzhin //
translated: Like a reflection in a mirror.

original: lhan cig skyes rnams rgyu mthun pas //
analyzed: lhan cig skyes rnams rgyu mthun pas //
translated: The connate ones are the cause.

original: bla na med pa'i go 'phang thob //
analyzed: bla na med pa'i go 'phang thob //
translated: The state of non-arising is attained.

original: aom yig gsum dang yang dag spyor //
analyzed: aom yig gsum dang yang dag spyor //
translated: The three syllables and the three seed syllables

original: thig le yang dag bsdus pa gcig //
analyzed: thig le yang dag bsdus pa gcig //
translated: are gathered into a single bindu.

original: de shes rab tu mi gnas pa //
analyzed: de shes rab tu mi gnas pa //
translated: That is the nonabiding wisdom,

original: chos dbyings bdag nyid nges pa yin //
analyzed: chos dbyings bdag nyid nges pa yin //
translated: the nature of the dharmadhātu.

original: yid ni der song sngags pa ni //
analyzed: yid ni der song sngags pa ni //
translated: The mind goes there, and the mantrin

original: snang ba med pa'i go 'phang 'gro //
analyzed: snang ba med pa'i go 'phang 'gro //
translated: goes to the stage of nonappearance.

original: bla na med pa'i lam spyad de //
analyzed: bla na med pa'i lam spyad de //
translated: Having practiced the unsurpassed path,

original: yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis gsungs //
analyzed: yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis gsungs //
translated: the perfect buddhahood is attained.

original: sa yig ri bong can gzugs gnas //
analyzed: sa yig ri bong can gzugs gnas //
translated: The syllable sa is the form of the rabbit-holder.

original: thig le lhan skyes mi 'jigs pa //
analyzed: thig le lhan skyes mi 'jigs pa //
translated: The connate bindu is fearless.

original: de ni srog gis rnam par shes //
analyzed: de ni srog gis rnam par shes //
translated: That is known as the life.

original: bla ma dam pa'i man ngag gis //
analyzed: bla ma dam pa'i man ngag gis //
translated: Through the intimate instructions of the sublime guru,

original: mdzod spu chen po'i sgo ru ni //
analyzed: mdzod spu chen po'i sgo ru ni //
translated: in the door of the great ūrṇā

original: sna tshogs thig le @193a * //
analyzed: sna tshogs thig le @193a * //
translated: the bindu of diversity

original: rnam par sgom //
analyzed: rnam par sgom //
translated: is meditated on.

original: dngos sgrub ma lus thob don du //
analyzed: dngos sgrub ma lus thob don du //
translated: In order to attain all accomplishments,

original: yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'gro //
analyzed: yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'gro //
translated: one goes to perfect buddhahood.

original: ba yig ra dang yang dag ldan //
analyzed: ba yig ra dang yang dag ldan //
translated: The syllable ba is endowed with ra.

original: tshangs pa'i bu ga'i rnal 'byor byed //
analyzed: tshangs pa'i bu ga'i rnal 'byor byed //
translated: The yogi should practice at the Brahma aperture.

original: legs pa'i 'od zer rnam pa lnga //
analyzed: legs pa'i 'od zer rnam pa lnga //
translated: The five-fold good light

original: sna tshogs rdo rje rnam dag 'gro //
analyzed: sna tshogs rdo rje rnam dag 'gro //
translated: goes to the pure vajra-cross.

original: dza yig nang du yang dag bsam //
analyzed: dza yig nang du yang dag bsam //
translated: One should visualize the letter ja inside.

original: ji ltar me shel ji bzhin ni //
analyzed: ji ltar me shel ji bzhin ni //
translated: Just like a fire crystal,

original: gzhan gyis grong du 'jug par nus //
analyzed: gzhan gyis grong du 'jug par nus //
translated: one is able to enter another's town.

original: rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs nus par 'gyur //🔽bu yig chu bur rnam pa 'dra //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs nus par 'gyur // bu yig chu bur rnam pa 'dra //
translated: One will have the power of various miracles.🔽The letter bu is like a water bubble.

original: dag pa'i shel dang mtshungs pa ni //
analyzed: dag pa'i shel dang mtshungs pa ni //
translated: Like a pure crystal,

original: 'gro drug rgyu ni bsreg byas nas //
analyzed: 'gro drug rgyu ni bsreg byas nas //
translated: having burned the cause of the six migrations,

original: mngon shes drug gi go 'phang thob //
analyzed: mngon shes drug gi go 'phang thob //
translated: one attains the state of the six higher perceptions.🔽One will definitely attain

original: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' nyid //🔽yun mi ring bar nges par thob //
analyzed: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' nyid // yun mi ring bar nges par thob //
translated: buddhahood and the state of a bodhisattva.

original: aom yig la gnas rnam par lta //
analyzed: aom yig la gnas rnam par lta //
translated: One should look at the letter oṃ.

original: bla med go 'phang yang dag 'thob //
analyzed: bla med go 'phang yang dag 'thob //
translated: One will attain the state of the unsurpassed.

original: dha yig gnyis med ngo bo ste //
analyzed: dha yig gnyis med ngo bo ste //
translated: The letter dha is the essence of non-duality,

original: stong nyid snying rje'i bdag nyid can //
analyzed: stong nyid snying rje'i bdag nyid can //
translated: the nature of emptiness and compassion.

original: glog dang byi ru yang dag 'dra //
analyzed: glog dang byi ru yang dag 'dra //
translated: Like a lightning bolt or coral,

original: aa yig nang du sang gnas pas //
analyzed: aa yig nang du sang gnas pas //
translated: the letter a resides inside.

original: nyin mtshan dag par bsgom pa las //
analyzed: nyin mtshan dag par bsgom pa las //
translated: Meditating on the pure day and night,

original: 'phral du yid ches byed pa ste //🔽mkhas pas bsgoms pa'i stobs kyis ni //🔽ci phyir ngo mtshar gsal mi 'gyur //
analyzed: 'phral du yid ches byed pa ste // mkhas pas bsgoms pa'i stobs kyis ni // ci phyir ngo mtshar gsal mi 'gyur //
translated: One should meditate on the syllable da,

original: d'a yig mkha' 'gro ma yis 'dra //
analyzed: d'a yig mkha' 'gro ma yis 'dra //
translated: Which is like a dakini,🔽And is the basis of bliss,

original: bde ba'i gzhi ni zla 'od can //
analyzed: bde ba'i gzhi ni zla 'od can //
translated: Which is like the light of the moon.

original: go yig nang du rnam bsgoms pas //
analyzed: go yig nang du rnam bsgoms pas //
translated: One should meditate on the syllable go,🔽Which is like a jasmine flower,🔽And is the basis of bliss,

original: mkha' la spyod pa nus par 'gyur //
analyzed: mkha' la spyod pa nus par 'gyur //
translated: Which is like the light of the moon.🔽One should meditate on the syllable gi,

original: gi yig rgya skyegs med tog mtshungs //
analyzed: gi yig rgya skyegs med tog mtshungs //
translated: Which is like a lac flower,🔽And is the basis of bliss,

original: 'od zer 'bar ba gsal gyur pa //
analyzed: 'od zer 'bar ba gsal gyur pa //
translated: Which is like the light of the moon.

original: ra yig nang du yang dag gnas //
analyzed: ra yig nang du yang dag gnas //
translated: One should meditate on the syllable ra,🔽Which is like a lac flower,🔽And is the basis of bliss,

original: 'od kyi phung por rnam par bsgoms //
analyzed: 'od kyi phung por rnam par bsgoms //
translated: Which is like the light of the moon.🔽One should meditate on the syllable ni,🔽Which is like a lac flower,

original: bsgoms pas bde ba yang dag skye //🔽nad med go 'phang thob par 'gyur //
analyzed: bsgoms pas bde ba yang dag skye // nad med go 'phang thob par 'gyur //
translated: And is the basis of bliss,

original: phyi nas thub dbang go 'phang ni //🔽byang chub mchog ni thob par 'gyur //
analyzed: phyi nas thub dbang go 'phang ni // byang chub mchog ni thob par 'gyur //
translated: Which is like the light of the moon.

original: ni yi yi ge nad sel ba //
analyzed: ni yi yi ge nad sel ba //
translated: One should meditate on the syllable de,🔽Which is like a lac flower,🔽And is the basis of bliss,

original: aindra n'i la ltar nus pa //
analyzed: aindra n'i la ltar nus pa //
translated: Which is like the light of the moon.

original: de yig snying por yang dag 'byung //
analyzed: de yig snying por yang dag 'byung //
translated: One should meditate on the syllable na,🔽Which is like a lac flower,🔽And is the basis of bliss,

original: ston ka'i zla ba lta bur bsgom //🔽yang dag bla ma'i man ngag ste //
analyzed: ston ka'i zla ba lta bur bsgom //🔽yang dag bla ma'i man ngag ste //
translated: Which is like the light of the moon.

original: lha yi mig gis blta bar bya //
analyzed: lha yi mig gis blta bar bya //
translated: One should look with the divine eye.

original: spyan ltar po ni thob 'gyur te //
analyzed: spyan ltar po ni thob 'gyur te //
translated: One will attain the eye of the gods,

original: de tshe sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur //
analyzed: de tshe sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur //
translated: and at that time one will become a buddha.

original: yi yig mkha' 'dra'i ye shes ni //
analyzed: yi yig mkha' 'dra'i ye shes ni //
translated: The wisdom of the syllable ya is like space,

original: 'od zer phreng ba 'khrugs pas 'khrugs //
analyzed: 'od zer phreng ba 'khrugs pas 'khrugs //
translated: agitated by a garland of light rays.

original: rnal 'byor chen pos lta bar byed //
analyzed: rnal 'byor chen pos lta bar byed //
translated: The great yogin should look.

original: ma yig nang du yang dag gnas //
analyzed: ma yig nang du yang dag gnas //
translated: The syllable ma is located within,

original: mnyam pa nyid kyi yid kyis ni //
analyzed: mnyam pa nyid kyi yid kyis ni //
translated: and with the mind of sameness

original: the tshom med par bsam par bya //
analyzed: the tshom med par bsam par bya //
translated: one should contemplate without doubt.

original: rgas dang 'chi ba rnam par spangs //
analyzed: rgas dang 'chi ba rnam par spangs //
translated: Old age and death are completely abandoned,

original: bla na med pa rab tu 'thob //
analyzed: bla na med pa rab tu 'thob //
translated: and the unsurpassed is attained.

original: ba yig thig le zlum po ni //
analyzed: ba yig thig le zlum po ni //
translated: The syllable va is a round bindu,

original: mdzes pa'i skar ma slad chen 'dra //
analyzed: mdzes pa'i skar ma slad chen 'dra //
translated: like a beautiful great star.

original: ka yig bzhi la yang dag @193b gnas //
analyzed: ka yig bzhi la yang dag @193b gnas //
translated: It is located in the four syllables ka.

original: bsgom bya rang bzhin g-yo med pa //
analyzed: bsgom bya rang bzhin g-yo med pa //
translated: The object of meditation is the unwavering nature.

original: 'dod don 'bras bu thob 'gyur te //
analyzed: 'dod don 'bras bu thob 'gyur te //
translated: One will attain the result that is the object of desire,

original: yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub byed //
analyzed: yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub byed //
translated: and one will attain perfect, complete awakening.

original: dngos dang dngos med rnam par grol //
analyzed: dngos dang dngos med rnam par grol //
translated: Liberated from things and nonthings,

original: lus can gyis ni mngon sum byed //
analyzed: lus can gyis ni mngon sum byed //
translated: it is perceived by embodied beings.

original: me yi sa bon gzi brjid ldan //
analyzed: me yi sa bon gzi brjid ldan //
translated: The seed syllable of fire is radiant.

original: 'bar ba gser 'gyur lta bu'i me //
analyzed: 'bar ba gser 'gyur lta bu'i me //
translated: The fire of the alchemical process of blazing

original: ao yig dbus su gzhag par bya //
analyzed: ao yig dbus su gzhag par bya //
translated: is placed in the middle of the letter o.

original: legs pa'i blo yis rtag tu bsams //
analyzed: legs pa'i blo yis rtag tu bsams //
translated: One should always contemplate it with a good mind.

original: nam mkha' bsregs pa tsam gyis ni //
analyzed: nam mkha' bsregs pa tsam gyis ni //
translated: By merely burning space,

original: dngos grub ri yi bdud rtsi 'dzag //
analyzed: dngos grub ri yi bdud rtsi 'dzag //
translated: the nectar of the mountain of siddhis drips.

original: de yis yang dag byugs tsam gyis //
analyzed: de yis yang dag byugs tsam gyis //
translated: By merely anointing with that,

original: byang chub gser ni thob par 'gyur //
analyzed: byang chub gser ni thob par 'gyur //
translated: one attains the gold of enlightenment.

original: wa yig kha dog sna tshogs pa //
analyzed: wa yig kha dog sna tshogs pa //
translated: The letter va is multicolored

original: gzhan yang yid bzhin nor bu ltar //
analyzed: gzhan yang yid bzhin nor bu ltar //
translated: and also like a wish-fulfilling gem.

original: tri yig dbus su yang dag gnas //
analyzed: tri yig dbus su yang dag gnas //
translated: The letter tri is perfectly located in the middle.

original: mar khu'i me bzhin 'bar ba yis //
analyzed: mar khu'i me bzhin 'bar ba yis //
translated: The fire that burns like butter

original: nyon mongs ma lus bsreg byas na //
analyzed: nyon mongs ma lus bsreg byas na //
translated: burns all afflictions.

original: khams dang dbang po la sogs kyang //
analyzed: khams dang dbang po la sogs kyang //
translated: The elements, sense organs, and so on🔽are the supreme Heruka.

original: legs zhu he ru ka yi mchog / bla na med pa myur du thob //
analyzed: legs zhu he ru ka yi mchog / bla na med pa myur du thob //
translated: The supreme, unsurpassed [state] is quickly attained.

original: nna yig ra dang yang dag ldan //
analyzed: nna yig ra dang yang dag ldan //
translated: The letter na is endowed with ra.

original: yi ge gsum ni che bar 'bar //
analyzed: yi ge gsum ni che bar 'bar //
translated: The three syllables blaze greatly.

original: ko yi yi ge'i phug tu gzhag /
analyzed: ko yi yi ge'i phug tu gzhag /
translated: The letter ko is placed in the hollow of the nose.

original: blo dang ldan pas rang sems bsgom //
analyzed: blo dang ldan pas rang sems bsgom //
translated: The wise one meditates on one's mind.

original: 'byung ba mchog tu dga' ba ste //
analyzed: 'byung ba mchog tu dga' ba ste //

original: srid dang mya ngan 'das ngo ni //
analyzed: srid dang mya ngan 'das ngo ni //
translated: The face of samsara and nirvana🔽is the supreme, unsurpassed [state].

original: rab 'jug bral bas dga' ba ste //
analyzed: rab 'jug bral bas dga' ba ste //
translated: The joy of the absence of engagement.

original: bya ngan 'das pa'i chos ni bsam //
analyzed: bya ngan 'das pa'i chos ni bsam //
translated: The Dharma that transcends evil is contemplated.

original: lhan cig skyes dga' mi g-yo ba //
analyzed: lhan cig skyes dga' mi g-yo ba //

original: lhan cig sbyor bas nang du gnas //
analyzed: lhan cig sbyor bas nang du gnas //

original: bsgom pa brtan par 'gyur pa yin //
analyzed: bsgom pa brtan par 'gyur pa yin //
translated: The meditation becomes stable.

original: bla na med pa'i go 'phang thob //🔽autpala sngon po lta bu yi //
analyzed: bla na med pa'i go 'phang thob // autpala sngon po lta bu yi //
translated: The unsurpassed stage is attained.🔽The letter ni, which is like a blue utpala flower,

original: ni yig sngon po'i thig le ni //
analyzed: ni yig sngon po'i thig le ni //
translated: is the blue drop.

original: ka yig sgo yi dbus gnas par //
analyzed: ka yig sgo yi dbus gnas par //
translated: It abides in the middle of the door of the letter ka,

original: me shel lta bur bsgom par bya //
analyzed: me shel lta bur bsgom par bya //
translated: which should be meditated on like a fire crystal.

original: de yi dbus su song ba'i sems //
analyzed: de yi dbus su song ba'i sems //
translated: The mind that has gone to its middle

original: bde ba chen pos yongs su gang //
analyzed: bde ba chen pos yongs su gang //
translated: is completely filled with great bliss.

original: sgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin gnas //
analyzed: sgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin gnas //
translated: One abides in the illusion-like concentration.

original: bla med go 'phang thob par 'gyur //
analyzed: bla med go 'phang thob par 'gyur //
translated: The unsurpassed stage is attained.

original: yi ge nyi ma'i gzugs dang 'dra //
analyzed: yi ge nyi ma'i gzugs dang 'dra //
translated: The letter is like the form of the sun.

original: de yi dbus su bde mdzad ma //
analyzed: de yi dbus su bde mdzad ma //
translated: In its middle is the blissful one.

original: la yig phug tu yang dag gnas //
analyzed: la yig phug tu yang dag gnas //
translated: It is situated in the cavity of the letter la.

original: dri ma bral ba rtag tu bsgom //
analyzed: dri ma bral ba rtag tu bsgom //
translated: One should always meditate on the stainless one.

original: sems ni de ru song ba la //
analyzed: sems ni de ru song ba la //
translated: The mind that has gone there

original: rang rig pa ni thob par 'gyur //
analyzed: rang rig pa ni thob par 'gyur //
translated: attains self-awareness.

original: rang rig rnal 'byor pa de yis //
analyzed: rang rig rnal 'byor pa de yis //
translated: That yogin of self-awareness

original: bla med go 'phang thob par 'gyur //
analyzed: bla med go 'phang thob par 'gyur //
translated: One will attain the unsurpassed state.

original: ba yig glog 'gyu'i rnam pa ni //
analyzed: ba yig glog 'gyu'i rnam pa ni //
translated: The letter va, in the form of lightning,

original: snang ba sgra yi rjes chags skyes //
analyzed: snang ba sgra yi rjes chags skyes //
translated: Arises from the pursuit of appearances and sounds.

original: ka yig dbus su yang dag blta //
analyzed: ka yig dbus su yang dag blta //
translated: Look correctly at the letter ka in the center,

original: dus mtshan nyid ni log par byed //
analyzed: dus mtshan nyid ni log par byed //
translated: And reverse the characteristics of the time of death.

original: rdo rje lta bu'i ting 'dzin gnas //
analyzed: rdo rje lta bu'i ting 'dzin gnas //
translated: Abiding in the vajra-like samadhi,

original: n'a da'i mtha' ni ye shes ltar //
analyzed: n'a da'i mtha' ni ye shes ltar //
translated: The end of the nada is like wisdom.

original: der gnas sems ni yang dag 'gyur //
analyzed: der gnas sems ni yang dag 'gyur //
translated: Abiding there, the mind becomes pure.

original: phyag rgya chen po mngon par thob //
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po mngon par thob //
translated: One attains the great seal.

original: me yi sa bon shing @194a * //
analyzed: me yi sa bon shing @194a * //
translated: The seed syllable of fire,🔽mounted on a horse,

original: rta zhon // dzra yig ji ltar 'bar ba ni //
analyzed: rta zhon // dzra yig ji ltar 'bar ba ni //
translated: The letter jra blazes,

original: hi yig la gnas bzhi brjod che //
analyzed: hi yig la gnas bzhi brjod che //
translated: Abiding in the letter hi, the great fourth.

original: ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin can //
analyzed: ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin can //
translated: Having the nature of the five wisdoms,

original: rtogs pa med pa'i sbyin sreg gis //
analyzed: rtogs pa med pa'i sbyin sreg gis //
translated: Through the fire offering of non-conceptuality,🔽The assembly of objects and sense faculties,

original: yul dang dbang po'i tshogs pa rnams / de yis me lha mnyes gyur nas //
analyzed: yul dang dbang po'i tshogs pa rnams / de yis me lha mnyes gyur nas //
translated: Having pleased the fire god with that,

original: dgyes pas dngos grub ster bar byed //
analyzed: dgyes pas dngos grub ster bar byed //
translated: Out of joy, he grants spiritual powers.

original: bee yig thig le'i rang bzhin ni //
analyzed: bee yig thig le'i rang bzhin ni //
translated: The letter ve, having the nature of a drop,

original: rdza mkhan 'khor lo lta bur 'khor //
analyzed: rdza mkhan 'khor lo lta bur 'khor //
translated: Spins like a potter's wheel.

original: sre yig rtse mor blta bar bya //
analyzed: sre yig rtse mor blta bar bya //
translated: Look at the peak of the letter se.

original: lhan cig skyes dga' mi g-yo bar //
analyzed: lhan cig skyes dga' mi g-yo bar //
translated: The innate joy is immovable,

original: srid dang mya ngan bral bas ni //
analyzed: srid dang mya ngan bral bas ni //
translated: free from existence and misery.

original: dri ma med pa'i 'bras bu thob //
analyzed: dri ma med pa'i 'bras bu thob //
translated: One attains the stainless fruit.

original: rtag tu goms pa'i rnal 'byor gyis //
analyzed: rtag tu goms pa'i rnal 'byor gyis //
translated: By the yoga of constant practice,

original: skye ba 'di la dngos grub thob //
analyzed: skye ba 'di la dngos grub thob //
translated: one attains power in this life.

original: ro yig 'bar dmar 'jigs pa yi //
analyzed: ro yig 'bar dmar 'jigs pa yi //
translated: The letter ra is red, blazing, and fearful,

original: ngu 'bod la sogs 'jigs par byed //
analyzed: ngu 'bod la sogs 'jigs par byed //
translated: terrifying the wailing and so forth.

original: gri yig bshad pa'i lam la gnas //
analyzed: gri yig bshad pa'i lam la gnas //
translated: The letter dha is located on the path of explanation,

original: 'od ldan thig le bsgom par bya //
analyzed: 'od ldan thig le bsgom par bya //
translated: one should meditate on the radiant bindu.

original: rnam par snang mdzad gzi brjid che //
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad gzi brjid che //
translated: Vairocana is greatly radiant,

original: bsgrub bya thams cad bsam par bya //
analyzed: bsgrub bya thams cad bsam par bya //
translated: one should imagine all those to be accomplished.

original: yun mi ring ba'i dus kyis ni //
analyzed: yun mi ring ba'i dus kyis ni //
translated: In a short time,

original: sangs rgyas chen po thob par 'gyur //
analyzed: sangs rgyas chen po thob par 'gyur //
translated: one will attain the state of a great buddha.

original: zla ba chu shel lta bu'i 'dra //
analyzed: zla ba chu shel lta bu'i 'dra //
translated: Like the moon and water crystal,

original: rtsa yig mdzes par bsam par bya //
analyzed: rtsa yig mdzes par bsam par bya //
translated: one should imagine the beautiful nāḍī syllables.

original: so yig nang du yang dag gnas //
analyzed: so yig nang du yang dag gnas //
translated: The letter sa is located within,

original: rnal 'byor pa yis rtag tu bsgom //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa yis rtag tu bsgom //
translated: always meditated upon by the yogī.

original: bde gshegs go 'phang thob par 'gyur //
analyzed: bde gshegs go 'phang thob par 'gyur //
translated: One will attain the state of the sugatas.

original: bzhi ba'i sku yi mchog gi mchog / rtag tu goms pa'i rnal 'byor gyi //
analyzed: bzhi ba'i sku yi mchog gi mchog / rtag tu goms pa'i rnal 'byor gyi //

original: rnal 'byor gyis ni dngos grub 'grub //
analyzed: rnal 'byor gyis ni dngos grub 'grub //
translated: By yoga, one attains power.

original: ni yig dri ma med pa nyid //
analyzed: ni yig dri ma med pa nyid //
translated: The syllable ni is stainless,

original: sprin bral nam mkha' lta bu yi //
analyzed: sprin bral nam mkha' lta bu yi //
translated: like a cloudless sky.

original: su yig yi ge'i nang gnas pa //
analyzed: su yig yi ge'i nang gnas pa //
translated: The syllable su is located within the syllables,

original: nyin dang mtshan du bsgom par bya //
analyzed: nyin dang mtshan du bsgom par bya //
translated: to be meditated on day and night.

original: dngos dang dngos med rnam grol ba //
analyzed: dngos dang dngos med rnam grol ba //
translated: Free from entity and non-entity,

original: chog tu zhi ba'i cha dang bral //
analyzed: chog tu zhi ba'i cha dang bral //
translated: completely free from the aspect of peace,

original: bsam gtan tsam gyis yang dag thob //
analyzed: bsam gtan tsam gyis yang dag thob //
translated: perfectly attained by mere concentration,

original: mtha' spyod gnas su khrid par byed ;
analyzed: mtha' spyod gnas su khrid par byed ;
translated: it leads to the stage of conduct at the end.

original: / yi yig rang bzhin med pa yi //
analyzed: / yi yig rang bzhin med pa yi //
translated: The syllable yi is essenceless,

original: stong nyid phra la rdul med pa //
analyzed: stong nyid phra la rdul med pa //
translated: subtle emptiness without particles.

original: na yig gnas pa'i yang dag lha //
analyzed: na yig gnas pa'i yang dag lha //
translated: The syllable na is the real deity,

original: 'od ldan rang bzhin dri ma med //
analyzed: 'od ldan rang bzhin dri ma med //
translated: luminous, naturally stainless.

original: de yi dbus su sems gzhag pa //
analyzed: de yi dbus su sems gzhag pa //
translated: Place the mind in its center,

original: dngos dang dngos med rnam par spangs //
analyzed: dngos dang dngos med rnam par spangs //
translated: free from entity and non-entity.

original: srid las grol ba blta bar bya //
analyzed: srid las grol ba blta bar bya //
translated: See it as liberated from existence.

original: sangs rgyas nyid ni grags pa bstan //
analyzed: sangs rgyas nyid ni grags pa bstan //
translated: Buddhahood is taught to be renowned.

original: phat yig ser po thig le ni //
analyzed: phat yig ser po thig le ni //
translated: The yellow syllable phaṭ is a drop

original: rtse mi rnams la mar lta bu //
analyzed: rtse mi rnams la mar lta bu //
translated: like the downward-facing tip.

original: sa yig nang du gzhag par bya //
analyzed: sa yig nang du gzhag par bya //
translated: The syllable sa is to be placed inside.

original: 'dod ldan drang zhing bsam par bya //
analyzed: 'dod ldan drang zhing bsam par bya //
translated: The desirous one should be upright and contemplated.

original: nyon mongs khams ni yang dag bsregs //
analyzed: nyon mongs khams ni yang dag bsregs //
translated: The element of afflictions is truly burned.

original: phung po khams ni zad par 'gro //
analyzed: phung po khams ni zad par 'gro //
translated: The aggregates and elements are exhausted.

original: tshe 'di nyid la thob par 'gyur //
analyzed: tshe 'di nyid la thob par 'gyur //
translated: It will be attained in this very lifetime.

original: skye ba dang ni 'chi ba spangs //
analyzed: skye ba dang ni 'chi ba spangs //
translated: Birth and death are abandoned.

original: sa 'dod rang 'dod @194b rig mar grags //
analyzed: sa 'dod rang 'dod @194b rig mar grags //
translated: The earth is desired, and the self is known as the consort.

original: yid kyi sprul pas mdzes pa'o //
analyzed: yid kyi sprul pas mdzes pa'o //
translated: The emanation of the mind is beautiful.

original: ma yig gzhon pa rnam par blta //
analyzed: ma yig gzhon pa rnam par blta //
translated: The letter ma is the youth, seen in parts.

original: yid la sing ba yod snyam byed //
analyzed: yid la sing ba yod snyam byed //
translated: It is thought to exist in the mind.

original: sgyur ma la ta bur yang dag gnas //
analyzed: sgyur ma la ta bur yang dag gnas //
translated: It is truly situated in the sugar cane.

original: dri za yi ni grang khyer ltar //
analyzed: dri za yi ni grang khyer ltar //
translated: Like the cold city of the gandharvas,

original: sems kyi 'jug pa tsam gyis ni //
analyzed: sems kyi 'jug pa tsam gyis ni //
translated: By the mere engagement of the mind,

original: de la go 'phang bla na med //
analyzed: de la go 'phang bla na med //
translated: That is the unsurpassed stage.

original: ha yig phal ma yang dag gnas //
analyzed: ha yig phal ma yang dag gnas //
translated: The letter ha is truly situated.

original: 'od zer 'khor lo g-yo zhing 'byung //
analyzed: 'od zer 'khor lo g-yo zhing 'byung //
translated: The light rays move and arise.

original: ku yi dbus su yang dag blta //
analyzed: ku yi dbus su yang dag blta //
translated: Look in the middle of the ku.

original: thig le rang bzhin dri ma med //
analyzed: thig le rang bzhin dri ma med //
translated: The nature of the drop is stainless.

original: bsgom pa bstan par 'gyur pa yis //
analyzed: bsgom pa bstan par 'gyur pa yis //
translated: By the teaching of meditation,

original: 'chi med nyid du skye bar 'gyur //
analyzed: 'chi med nyid du skye bar 'gyur //
translated: One will be born as immortal.

original: yun mi ring ba'i dus kyis ni //
analyzed: yun mi ring ba'i dus kyis ni //
translated: In a short time,

original: go 'phang bla na med pa thob //
analyzed: go 'phang bla na med pa thob //
translated: The unsurpassed stage is attained.

original: hri bri'i yi ge'i dbus su ni //
analyzed: hri bri'i yi ge'i dbus su ni //
translated: In the middle of the Śrīm syllable

original: yid du 'ong ba'i sangs rgyas gnas //
analyzed: yid du 'ong ba'i sangs rgyas gnas //
translated: is the abode of the delightful Buddha.

original: drag po gsum dang ldan pa la //
analyzed: drag po gsum dang ldan pa la //
translated: In the one endowed with the three fierce ones,

original: de'i dbus gsal bar bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: de'i dbus gsal bar bsgom pa'o //
translated: one should meditate on the clarity in the middle.

original: g-yas na mar me nyi ma'i cha //
analyzed: g-yas na mar me nyi ma'i cha //
translated: On the right, the lamp is the portion of the sun,

original: drod dang snying rje sprul ba'o //
analyzed: drod dang snying rje sprul ba'o //
translated: the heat, compassion, and emanation.

original: nyin mo rab gnas ye shes grags //
analyzed: nyin mo rab gnas ye shes grags //
translated: The one abiding in the day is known as gnosis.

original: dus dang thabs kyis kun rdzob po //
analyzed: dus dang thabs kyis kun rdzob po //
translated: The relative is by means of time and method.

original: lho ru rgyu bab 'du ba ste //
analyzed: lho ru rgyu bab 'du ba ste //
translated: In the south, the downward flow is the gathering,

original: rtsa nas khrag ni 'bar bar byed //
analyzed: rtsa nas khrag ni 'bar bar byed //
translated: the channel that blazes with blood.

original: 'byin pas nyon mongs nges par 'joms //
analyzed: 'byin pas nyon mongs nges par 'joms //
translated: By emitting, the afflictions are definitely conquered.

original: lus ni mya ngan 'das bsgom bya //
analyzed: lus ni mya ngan 'das bsgom bya //
translated: The body is cultivated as nirvāṇa.

original: g-yon gyi h'um gi yi ge dkar //
analyzed: g-yon gyi h'um gi yi ge dkar //
translated: The white syllable hūṃ on the left

original: rnam shes rmi lam zla ba nyid //
analyzed: rnam shes rmi lam zla ba nyid //
translated: is consciousness, the dream, and the moon itself.

original: byang du 'gro ba shes rab brjod //
analyzed: byang du 'gro ba shes rab brjod //
translated: The one moving to the north is called wisdom.

original: stong nyid mtshan mo de bzhin du //
analyzed: stong nyid mtshan mo de bzhin du //
translated: Emptiness is the night, and likewise,

original: 'jug pa'i lam ni longs spyod rdzogs //
analyzed: 'jug pa'i lam ni longs spyod rdzogs //
translated: the path of entry is the enjoyment body.

original: chu ni 'bab par byed pa'i rtsa //
analyzed: chu ni 'bab par byed pa'i rtsa //
translated: The channel that causes the flow of water

original: tshang pa mya ngan 'das par grags //
analyzed: tshang pa mya ngan 'das par grags //
translated: is known as nirvāṇa.

original: nye ba'i nyon mongs zad byed pa //
analyzed: nye ba'i nyon mongs zad byed pa //
translated: It causes the exhaustion of the secondary afflictions.

original: mdun du sngon po drag po ste //
analyzed: mdun du sngon po drag po ste //
translated: In front, it is a fierce blue.

original: snying la a'a yig mi g-yo ba //
analyzed: snying la a'a yig mi g-yo ba //
translated: In the heart, the letter A is unmoving.

original: gnyis med ye shes zhes brjod pa //
analyzed: gnyis med ye shes zhes brjod pa //
translated: It is called “nondual wisdom,”

original: dmigs med dri ma med pa'o //🔽chu shing me tog yang dag 'dra //
analyzed: dmigs med dri ma med pa'o // chu shing me tog yang dag 'dra //
translated: without reference point, and stainless.🔽It is just like the flower of the plantain tree,

original: til gyi mi mar bzhin du 'bar //
analyzed: til gyi mi mar bzhin du 'bar //
translated: burning like the oil of sesame seeds.

original: nyon mongs kun ni zad par byed //
analyzed: nyon mongs kun ni zad par byed //
translated: It causes the exhaustion of all afflictions.

original: der song sems ni mya ngan 'das //
analyzed: der song sems ni mya ngan 'das //
translated: The mind that has gone there is nirvāṇa.

original: chos kyi lam zhes ye shes ni //
analyzed: chos kyi lam zhes ye shes ni //
translated: The wisdom of the path of Dharma🔽is the supreme of all supreme wisdoms.

original: yang dag ye shes mchog gi mchog / yun mi ring bar thob 'gyur te //
analyzed: yang dag ye shes mchog gi mchog / yun mi ring bar thob 'gyur te //
translated: Before long, it will be attained,

original: rdo rje sems dang mnyam par 'gyur //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dang mnyam par 'gyur //
translated: and one will become equal to Vajrasattva.

original: dku gsung rang bzhin zhes brjod pa //
analyzed: dku gsung rang bzhin zhes brjod pa //
translated: The side is said to be the nature of speech.

original: dbus su thog lo gzhi med pa //
analyzed: dbus su thog lo gzhi med pa //
translated: In the middle, the basis of the sky is baseless.

original: lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin nyid //
analyzed: lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin nyid //
translated: It is the nature of the connate,

original: sems can kun la rnam par gnas //
analyzed: sems can kun la rnam par gnas //
translated: present in all sentient beings.

original: de ltar bsgoms pa'i rnal 'byor bas //
analyzed: de ltar bsgoms pa'i rnal 'byor bas //
translated: The yogi/nī who meditates in that way

original: dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur //
analyzed: dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur //
translated: will quickly attain spiritual powers.

original: rab tu mi gnas 'bras thob pas //
analyzed: rab tu mi gnas 'bras thob pas //
translated: Having attained the result of nonabiding,

original: bla na med pa bzhi ru 'gro //
analyzed: bla na med pa bzhi ru 'gro //
translated: one will go to the four unsurpassed [Buddha activities].

original: a'a li k'a li 'gog pa las //
analyzed: a'a li k'a li 'gog pa las //
translated: From the cessation of the vowels and consonants,

original: ri bo de ni nges par sbyar //
analyzed: ri bo de ni nges par sbyar //
translated: The mountain is certainly joined.

original: rang bzhin 'od gsal mchog gi mchog //🔽n'a da'i @195a * //
analyzed: rang bzhin 'od gsal mchog gi mchog // n'a da'i @195a * //
translated: The nature is clear light, the supreme of the supreme.

original: mthar ni 'bar ba che //
analyzed: mthar ni 'bar ba che //
translated: At the end of the nāḍī, there is great blazing.

original: phra mor byas pa'i sems nyid ni //
analyzed: phra mor byas pa'i sems nyid ni //
translated: The mind itself is made subtle.

original: mi g-yo nyid du 'gro ba yi //
analyzed: mi g-yo nyid du 'gro ba yi //
translated: It goes to the state of non-movement.

original: de yi longs spyod bsams pa yi //
analyzed: de yi longs spyod bsams pa yi //
translated: The enjoyment of that is the contemplation.

original: lhun gyis grub pa rtag pa nyid //
analyzed: lhun gyis grub pa rtag pa nyid //
translated: Spontaneously present, it is permanent.

original: de ltar gus pas rgyun mi 'chad //
analyzed: de ltar gus pas rgyun mi 'chad //
translated: In that way, with devotion, without break,

original: bsgom pa yun ring rnam par bsam //
analyzed: bsgom pa yun ring rnam par bsam //
translated: Contemplate the meditation for a long time.

original: yun ring bsgoms pa'i yid kyis ni ;
analyzed: yun ring bsgoms pa'i yid kyis ni ;
translated: The mind that meditates for a long time

original: / bde ba chen po thob par 'gyur //
analyzed: / bde ba chen po thob par 'gyur //
translated: Attains supreme bliss.

original: de ni do ha ko shar gsungs //
analyzed: de ni do ha ko shar gsungs //
translated: That is explained in the Treasury of Songs of Realization.

original: sa bon gcig la sdong po gnyis //
analyzed: sa bon gcig la sdong po gnyis //
translated: Two trees from a single seed.

original: rgyu mtshan des na 'bras bu gcig //🔽dbyer med de ni mngon byas pa //
analyzed: rgyu mtshan des na 'bras bu gcig // dbyer med de ni mngon byas pa //
translated: For that reason, there is a single result.🔽That indivisibility is actualized.

original: de ni srid 'das rnam par grol //
analyzed: de ni srid 'das rnam par grol //
translated: That is the transcendence of existence, liberation.

original: sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rgyud las gsungs //🔽thig pa sna tshogs thabs tshul gyis //
analyzed: sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rgyud las gsungs // thig pa sna tshogs thabs tshul gyis //
translated: It is explained in the Magical Net Tantra.🔽The one who contemplates the benefit of migrating beings

original: 'gro ba'i don la rtog pa po //
analyzed: 'gro ba'i don la rtog pa po //
translated: With various methods of the bindu

original: theg pa gsum gyis nges 'byung ba //
analyzed: theg pa gsum gyis nges 'byung ba //
translated: Is liberated by the three vehicles.

original: theg pa gcig gi 'bras bur gnas //
analyzed: theg pa gcig gi 'bras bur gnas //
translated: Abide in the result of the single vehicle.

original: nyon mongs khams rnams dag pa'i bdag //
analyzed: nyon mongs khams rnams dag pa'i bdag //
translated: The nature of the pure element of afflictions,

original: las ki khams rnams zad byed pa //
analyzed: las ki khams rnams zad byed pa //
translated: The one who causes the exhaustion of the elements of karma,

original: chu bo'i rgya mtsho kun las rgal //
analyzed: chu bo'i rgya mtsho kun las rgal //
translated: Has crossed over all the rivers and oceans,

original: sbyor ba'i dgod pa las byung pa //🔽nyon mongs nye ba kun nyon mongs //
analyzed: sbyor ba'i dgod pa las byung pa // nyon mongs nye ba kun nyon mongs //
translated: Arisen from the placement of the union,

original: bag chags bcas pas gtan spangs pa //
analyzed: bag chags bcas pas gtan spangs pa //
translated: The one who has abandoned all the afflictions and the secondary afflictions,🔽The one who has abandoned the traces forever,

original: snying rje chen po shes rab thabs //
analyzed: snying rje chen po shes rab thabs //
translated: Great compassion, method, and wisdom,

original: don yod 'gro ba'i don byed pa //
analyzed: don yod 'gro ba'i don byed pa //
translated: The one who benefits the aimless migrating beings,

original: 'du shes gsum gyis don spangs pa //
analyzed: 'du shes gsum gyis don spangs pa //
translated: The one who has abandoned the aim of the three perceptions,

original: rnam shes don ni 'gag par byed //
analyzed: rnam shes don ni 'gag par byed //
translated: The one who has stopped the aim of consciousness,

original: sems can kun yid yul dang ldan //
analyzed: sems can kun yid yul dang ldan //
translated: The object of the minds of all sentient beings,

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs rig pa //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs rig pa //
translated: The mind of all buddhas,

original: sems can kun gyi yid la gnas //
analyzed: sems can kun gyi yid la gnas //
translated: Resides in the mind of all sentient beings.

original: de ltar de shes rnal 'byor pas //
analyzed: de ltar de shes rnal 'byor pas //
translated: Thus, the yogin who knows that

original: gang zhig blo ldan rtag tu slob //
analyzed: gang zhig blo ldan rtag tu slob //
translated: The wise one who always trains

original: 'grub par 'gyur ba the tshom med //
analyzed: 'grub par 'gyur ba the tshom med //
translated: Will undoubtedly be accomplished.

original: bsod nams dman pa'i mi yis kyang //
analyzed: bsod nams dman pa'i mi yis kyang //
translated: Even a person of little merit

original: the tshom med par de yis 'grub //
analyzed: the tshom med par de yis 'grub //
translated: Will undoubtedly be accomplished by that.

original: gus pas sgrub pa po yis ni //
analyzed: gus pas sgrub pa po yis ni //
translated: The one who practices with devotion

original: gus bcas ston pa mchod bya zhing //
analyzed: gus bcas ston pa mchod bya zhing //
translated: One should worship the teacher with devotion,

original: las rnams kun la gus par bya //
analyzed: las rnams kun la gus par bya //
translated: and be devoted to all actions.

original: ro gcig gis brjod rnam par rmongs pa'i sems kyis bsgom pa yang dag gsal don du //
analyzed: ro gcig gis brjod rnam par rmongs pa'i sems kyis bsgom pa yang dag gsal don du //
translated: The meditation of the deluded mind is expressed with one taste.🔽The channels and elements are equalized in the dakini, and the stages of the places, and so on,

original: rtsa dang khams ni mnyam nyid mkha' 'gro mar ldan gnas la sogs pa'i sa rnams dang // de nyid re re'i dbye ba byas las dpal ldan rdo rje lha mo'i thugs //
analyzed: rtsa dang khams ni mnyam nyid mkha' 'gro mar ldan gnas la sogs pa'i sa rnams dang // de nyid re re'i dbye ba byas las dpal ldan rdo rje lha mo'i thugs //
translated: are the glorious vajra goddess's mind, which is made from the divisions of each reality.

original: bde ba ro gcig gang la gsang ba sum cu rtsa gnyis de nyid dri ma med pa ni //
analyzed: bde ba ro gcig gang la gsang ba sum cu rtsa gnyis de nyid dri ma med pa ni //
translated: The thirty-two secrets are stainless in the one taste of bliss.

original: sngags don nges bstan byas pa la //
analyzed: sngags don nges bstan byas pa la //
translated: The meaning of the mantra is explained.

original: bdag gi dge ba gang bsgrubs pa //
analyzed: bdag gi dge ba gang bsgrubs pa //
translated: Whatever virtue I have accomplished

original: dpal ldan phyag rgya chen po'i go 'phang ni //
analyzed: dpal ldan phyag rgya chen po'i go 'phang ni //
translated: is dedicated to the stage of glorious mahāmudrā.🔽May all migrating beings quickly accomplish it.

original: des ni 'gro rnams myur du 'grub gyur cig / mchog tu za ba pa dpal dan rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i sngags kyi de kho na nyid nges @195b par bstan pa //
analyzed: des ni 'gro rnams myur du 'grub gyur cig / mchog tu za ba pa dpal dan rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i sngags kyi de kho na nyid nges @195b par bstan pa //
translated: The Supreme Secret: The Explanation of the Reality of the Mantra of Glorious Vajrayoginī

original: slob dpon aindra bh'a tis mdzad pa rdzogs rung bar 'dug nas rdo rje rnal 'byor ma bsgom pa pa brtson phab pa'o//
analyzed: slob dpon aindra bh'a tis mdzad pa rdzogs rung bar 'dug nas rdo rje rnal 'byor ma bsgom pa pa brtson phab pa'o//
translated: I have put effort into meditating on Vajrayoginī.
